tool_description: Real-time crypto market prices and fiat currencies exchange rate.
name: Crypto Market Prices
title: Crypto Market Prices

api_list.name: GET /currencies
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://crypto-market-prices.p.rapidapi.com/currencies"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "crypto-market-prices.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://crypto-market-prices.p.rapidapi.com/currencies"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "crypto-market-prices.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: GET /currencies/convert
api_list.description: This API endpoint converts one fiat currency to another fiat currency.

optional_parameters.name: to
optional_parameters.description:
Target currency to convert to, default to **VND**. You can specify one of the supported fiats.
Check `/currencies` endpoint.

optional_parameters.name: from
optional_parameters.description:
Current currency, default to **USD**. You can specify one of the supported fiats.
Check `/currencies` endpoint.

optional_parameters.name: amount
optional_parameters.description: Total amount of money to convert. Default to 1.

api_list.name: GET /tokens/{symbol}
api_list.description: Get the  latest market price of a cryptocurrency from multiple exchanges and in any fiat currency.

required_parameters.name: symbol
required_parameters.description: Cryptocurrency symbol, such as BTC, ETH, BNB, etc. Case insensitive.

optional_parameters.name: base
optional_parameters.description:
Pricing currency, default to **USDT**. You can specify one of the supported fiats.
Check `/currencies` endpoint.

api_list.name: GET /exchanges/{name}/{symbol}
api_list.description: Get the  latest market price of a cryptocurrency from specific exchange in any fiat currency.

required_parameters.name: symbol
required_parameters.description: Cryptocurrency symbol, such as BTC, ETH, BNB, etc. Case insensitive.

optional_parameters.name: base
optional_parameters.description:
Pricing currency, default to **USDT**. You can specify one of the supported fiats.
Check `/currencies` endpoint.

api_list.name: GET /tokens
api_list.description: Retrieve a list of all cryptocurrencies with their corresponding prices in any currency.

optional_parameters.name: base
optional_parameters.description:
Pricing currency, default to **USDT**. You can specify one of the supported fiats.
Check `/currencies` endpoint.

api_list.name: GET /exchanges/{name}
api_list.description: Fetch the listing tokens from a given cryptocurrency exchange, with prices in any desired currency.

optional_parameters.name: base
optional_parameters.description:
Pricing currency, default to **USDT**. You can specify one of the supported fiats.
Check `/currencies` endpoint.
